item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 3)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Butcher (Level 4)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level 7)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Archivist (Level 5)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Product Manager (Level 6)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Gipsy (Level 8)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Master Historian (Level 9)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 9)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 586 times with git add -p.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 2)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 7)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Architect (Level 6)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Master Gipsy (Level 7)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 1)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Tree Trimmer (Level 4)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Traveler (Level 6)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 9)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Merchant (Level 6)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.
